[00:00.22]"No thank you" is what I should've said, I should be in bed
[00:07.14]But temptations of trouble on my tongue, troubles yet to come
[00:15.24]One sip, bad for me
[00:17.08]One hit, bad for me
[00:18.93]One kiss, bad for me
[00:20.90]But I give in so easily

[00:27.71]I should stay strong
